metadata.name: Beyond Boundaries
metadata.description: A world where the blurred line between reality and the digital realm is a distant relic of the past, art and technology work together to explore what lies beyond the threshold. This beautiful collection is a showcase on how these two ever-changing fields are impacting each other. With the advent of new technologies, the way we interact with art is also changing. We no longer need to be in the same physical space as a work of art to appreciate it, we can now experience it through digital means. Consider the future, an exploration into the heart of the machines, an ode to the age beyond tools, beyond assistance - beyond boundaries.
